puzzle.screen.title: Puzzle Settings
puzzle.option.show_version_info.tooltip:
Show information about the current
Puzzle version and update status on
the Title Screen and F3 Menu
puzzle.option.resourcepack_splash_screen:
Enables resourcepacks to change the look
of Minecraft's loading/splash
screen using the OptiFine format
puzzle.option.better_splash_screen_blend:
Changes the type of blending used
by the logo on the splash screen
to work better with custom colored logos
Unlocks full 360° rotation on custom block/item models
puzzle.option.bigger_custom_models.toolt:
Increases the limit of
custom block/item model sizes
from 3x3x3 to 5x5x5
puzzle.midnightconfig.title: Puzzle Advanced Config
cullleaves.puzzle.option.enabled.tooltip: Enable the culling of leaves to enhance performance
iris.puzzle.option.enableShaders.tooltip: Whether or not to enable shaderpacks
options.iris.shaderPackSelection.tooltip:
Open a screen to select
shaderpacks and configure them
lambdabettergrass.option.mode.tooltip:
Makes the sides of
grass blocks connect to
adjacent grass blocks
lambdabettergrass.option.better_snow.too:
Adds a purely visual snow/moss layer
to non-full blocks that
are surrounded by snow/moss
Reduces Minecraft's FPS when unfocused
(i.e. another window is focused or the game is hidden)
to save power and system resources
config.dynamicfps.unfocused_fps.tooltip:
The amount of frames per second
Minecraft is allowed to
render at while unfocused
config.dynamicfps.restore_when_hovered.t:
Whether or not to stop the
FPS limiting while Minecraft is previewed
(i.e. hovered on task bar or dock)
config.dynamicfps.run_gc_on_unfocus.tool:
Run a garbage collector while
Minecraft is not focused to
free up some RAM
config.dynamicfps.unfocused_volume.toolt:
The volume the game should play
sound at while unfocused
(i.e. another window is selected)
config.dynamicfps.hidden_volume.tooltip:
The volume the game should play
sound at while not visible
(i.e. minimized, covered by other windows
or on another virtual desktop)
